revised_title: Hybrid Composites: Recursion Analysis and Statistical Properties
tldr: This article presents an adaptation of the chain-of-bundles probability model for unidirectional intraply hybrid composites, consisting of two types of fibers. The authors develop an upper bound for the hybrid median strength and demonstrate that the strength distribution for the hybrid composite has a weakest link structure. They also discuss the importance of understanding the behavior of hybrid composites under load for their potential use in various applications.
